songs.title: Smokin’ 4:20
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
We just keep on smoking
Smoking
We just keep on smokin g
Smoking
We just keep on smoking
Getting high
Smoking
Stay stupid
Smoking
Yea
Smoke on
We just keep on smoking
Stay smoking
Smoking
Getting high
Smoking

[Verse 1]
See i post on up and I’m up in the cut toking smoking the blunt packing some of that skunk
If you rolling it up just lay on out just drift on out whatchu talking about ?
Whatchu talking to me well  I’m talking to you yea Im bumping speakers pumping nothing something to do
Get a  a can of this oil turn we record you backtrack to the stack pull out that ointment I had
I’m already smoked out haze I’m in a daze don't get choked out kinda means
Im kinda funny dance with my money having a ball at the after hours loving you honey
I planing something wild a little juice and gin  the party cracking make it happen after you get in cuz when the pops is popping keep going don't stopping is where the girls like to give it on the dancefloor  top don't stop

[Chorus]

[Verse 2]
I’m way in the zone two shots of hennessy a splash of patron roll a kush blunt have a zone king kong
Smoking out the bong like we cheech and chong
A spot thirty still early and Im off that funk that back yard plant nigga monster skunk got a trunk of kush
Bundles of the bomb in lump
While we smoke out this what lifes about I’m smelling like money coming sunning the drought put the blunt in your mouth
Water flow like a fountain is a party over here and no squares are allowed in hands in the air like you don’t care  just rolling up a swiffer smoke everywhere grab your girl and rock out I pull a kush block out team magnum kurupt don’t give a fuck what you bout

[Chorus]
